rocketchat-saml.name: user
rocketchat-saml.description: Normal user rights. Most users receive this role when registering

rocketchat-saml.name: admin
rocketchat-saml.description: Have access to all settings and administrator tools.

rocketchat-saml.name: livechat-agent
rocketchat-saml.description: Agents of livechat. They can answer to livechat requests.

rocketchat-saml.name: livechat-manager
rocketchat-saml.description: Manager of livechat, they can manage agents and guest.
